body:
#Hyperion.ai

Hyperion.ai is the product of a startup I am currently the founding CEO of. It is a custom multivitamin that improves itself over time by using artificial intelligence to continuously monitor and analyze a user's health data. This writeup will be focused primarily on the business, tech aspects, and other behind the scenes aspects of Hyperion.ai. For more information about the product itself, check out: http://hyperion.ai

#Overview

#Progress

We currently have a functioning prototype of the app on TestFlight. We are planning to have a beta out on the iOS app store within the next few months. While the app is currently not in app stores yet, I have a recording here of our prototype in action:

And if you are interested in trying out the app yourself (iOS only at the moment—support for other platforms planned), please don't hesitate to reach out!
